  "methodology": "Identified European private B2B food-ingredient and specialty food-chemical suppliers by triangulating (i) company websites and product portfolios, (ii) PE portfolio pages and deal announcements, and (iii) business databases/trade sources that commonly publish revenue bands (e.g., Dun & Bradstreet/Orbis-style profiles, PitchBook-style summaries, and trade press interviews). parsed_response.methodology: Identified European private B2B food-ingredient and specialty food-chemical suppliers by triangulating (i) company websites and product portfolios, (ii) PE portfolio pages and deal announcements, and (iii) business databases/trade sources that commonly publish revenue bands (e.g., Dun & Bradstreet/Orbis-style profiles, PitchBook-style summaries, and trade press interviews). For each target, screened for: European HQ, private ownership (family or PE-backed), B2B to food & beverage manufacturers, and a defensible revenue band in the €50M–€500M range based on publicly stated figures, press coverage, or widely cited database estimates.
